attributes.action: Grant full exemptions from quarantine for seafarers and oil & gas workers
attributes.additional_details: The Marine and Offshore Oil & Gas industry are taking many measures to ensure their personnel are virus free. If workers in this sector are forced to quarantine after extended periods away from home it could be extremely detrimental to their mental health and wellbeing. We are world leaders in these  industries which are fundamental to a strong economy.
attributes.background: Engage with the relevant industry representatives to ensure that these vital industries are exempt from the latest quarantine rules.
